recipesJson.name: Velvet Shadow
recipesJson.author: Apoc17
recipesJson.description: Dragonfruit with a hint of raspberry wrapped with french vanilla.  It's another one of my special mixes I came up with personally while playing around in my "lab" (basement).  As always mix until frothy then I heat up in a baby bottle warmer for 15 minutes then cool with the cap off.  Then I let it sit for at least 2-3 days.  Taste is all relative though...enjoy!
